original_title: SL Rupee depreciates against USD again
original_body_lines: The Sri Lankan Rupee (LKR) has depreciated against the US Dollar (USD) today compared to the last two days, according to the Central Bank of Sri Lanka.
Accordingly, today's buying rate of USD is Rs 312.55 while the selling rate is Rs. 326.65.
Meanwhile, yesterday's buying rate of USD was Rs. 308.60 while the selling rate was Rs. 322.20.
